>>Weather Langenberg

Langenberg's climate is classified as warm and temperate. In Langenberg, precipitation is notable throughout the entirety of the year, with even its most arid month still experiencing a considerable amount of rainfall. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Cfb. The temperature in this location is approximately 6.7 °C | 44.1 °F, as determined by statistical analysis. Precipitation here is about 997 mm | 39.3 inch per year.

The designated area is positioned within the northern hemisphere of our globe. The warm and pleasant days of the Summer season commence towards the conclusion of June and come to an end in September. This particular period includes a span of months, namely: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Langenberg

The least amount of rainfall occurs in February. The average in this month is 61 mm | 2.4 inch. The maximum quantity of rainfall is observed during the month of July, exhibiting an average value of 114 mm | 4.5 inch.

The variation in the precipitation between the driest and wettest months is 53 mm | 2 inch. The degree of fluctuation in the yearly temperature is approximately 18.8 °C | 33.9 °F.

In terms of relative humidity, the month that exhibits the highest level is November with a percentage of 71.91. Conversely, April has been recorded as having the lowest amount of relative humidity at only 71.91. It is noteworthy that July has the highest number of rainy days, amounting to 16.77, whereas the month with the least rainfall is October, experiencing only 12.03 wet days.

Total hours of sun

On average, the location of Langenberg records the highest number of daily sunshine hours during July. The mean duration of sunlight per day in this month is approximately 9.72, with a total cumulative count reaching up to 301.4.

On average, Langenberg records the lowest daily sunshine hours in January. During this period, there is an average of 2.42 hours of sunlight per day and a total accumulation of 75.11 hours.

Throughout the year, a total of 2158.19 hours of light are recorded in the location of Langenberg. The monthly average for sunlight is approximately 70.81 hours.
